content: CFS-CID MD HS GUI Guide sleeve for metal deck Installation aid for use with post-drill, cast-in firestop devices for corrugated metal decks ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection- ### FEATURES:Features Guide sleeve designed to speed-up installation of cast-in firestop devices in metal deck slabs Protects firestop material after fastening it to metal deck â€“ so you can cut openings in the deck through the cast-in device Applications Cutting openings in corrugated metal deck through pre-fastened cast-in firestop devices to run pipes or conduits Available in three custom sizes to fit CFS-CID MD 2, 3 and 4 cast-in firestop devices ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2204937 - Hole saw guide CFS-CID MD HS GUI2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2204938 - Hole saw guide CFS-CID MD HS GUI3 - Package Size 6 pc - 2204939 - Hole saw guide CFS-CID MD HS GUI4 - Package Size 1 pc
